Name: kraken's curse
About the game: A rogue-like pirate adventure game. Explore a skeleton-riddled archipelago in search of a giant monster. Follow treasure maps and hints to items, weapons and secrets. Can you defeat the terrible kraken? Features fun combat mechanics ships, cannons and rafts funny legs randomly generated map - different each time you play! 6+ treasures to find about 1+ hour of play time Controls X to grab Z to use item / shoot cannon C to swap item / cannon side Also playable with controller. Special thanks to Joanne for the voice-acting! Note: the game is not saved when you quit or restart! Sokpop makes a new game every two weeks! Subscribe for 3$ per month at
